HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: Check out the new options panel (Options > Mod Settings), where you can customize the beds' color scheme to your liking!|Also, notice the beddings' category has been changed to Apparel, for compatibility purposes.|The full change log is on our Steam Workshop page.

Your beds have just been improved!|- The code for the bed insulation properties has been revised to overcome a RimWorld quirk. Now it will also affect your pawn's "Slept in Cold/Heat" thoughts, just like it was supposed to.|- You can now copy & paste beddings settings from one bed to another.|- Hospitality is no longer required!|- Improved performance & compatibility with other mods.|You can find the full change log on our Steam Workshop page.|(NOTE: Due to the changes, loading a saved game for the first time with the development mode activated might produce some red errors on the log window. They are harmless, please just ignore them.)

A new feature was added to the mod settings! |img:MiyuriMode|caption:You can now choose to have your beds manually unmade by a colonist, instead of the bedding just popping out when you command it to unmake. It works just like other game objects with and on/off switch. To activate this, open the mod settings panel (Options > Mod Settings) and select Require a colonist to unmake beds. |Other improvements on this version: |- The rest effectiveness for the Animal Bed was adjusted so it doesn't get too powerful once the textile softness bonus is applied. |- The report window for a sleeping pawn takes the bed into account for the min/max comfortable temperature calculation once again (it was missing on RW 1.1).

I want your opinion! |I'm conducting a survey on what textile materials added by other mods turn up with a weird softness value. This information could help us improve the formula that generates it. If you use a mod that adds textiles and its softness number feels odd to you, drop me a line! Just follow the link above or look for the discussion on our steam page. |Thank you! |Improvements on this version: |- New languages added: Italian & Chinese (courtesy of Sergio di Napoli & leafzxg respectively). |- Improved performance on Hospitality integration (courtesy of Lannan). |- Animal Beds now provide cold insulation to your pets, same as bedrolls. |- Fixed error when adding beds to caravans. |- Updated load order rules for various mods.

Improved integration with Vanilla Factions Expanded - Vikings! |img:../Textures/Things/Beddings/FurBeddingSingle,../Textures/Things/Beddings/FurBeddingDouble |If you're playing with that mod, we have some news for you. Now the fur beds will also require the use of separate beddings for them to achieve their full potential! |The new Fur Beddings can be made at the Crafting Spot or the Tailoring Bech just like the regular ones. They require more material to be produced, but become available before the regular beddings, alongside the fur beds themselves (unless you're also using Vanilla Furniture Expanded, in which case they will require the research of Basic Furniture). Thanks to JupiterLily for this awesome addition! |This version also includes new translations for Spanish and Russian (courtesy of Chivalry Dark & Stalin). |Enjoy! |img:Ko-fi|caption:Making mods is fun, mantaining them takes a lot of work! If you like what we did here, please consider supporting us with a cup of coffee. Follow the link above or go to ko-fi.com/jptrrs. Thank you!
